text:
Varnish Software | Software Engineer | New York City (NYC), NY

C, Linux

Varnish Software is the company behind Varnish Cache, the popular open source caching proxy. Looking for a full time engineer who is comfortable working with Varnish Cache and VCL, C, Linux, HTTP and with client facing interactions. Full benefits, all skill levels considered.

If you are interested, please email: reza AT varnish-software DOT com
